title: Otiluke's Resilient Sphere
content:
Cure Wounds Level 4 Evocation Spell Enclose a target in a sphere of shimmering force, reducing its movement speed by half, and blocking all incoming and outgoing damage. 3 turns The target can't be Huge in size. 18m DEX Save Concentration Action Level 4 Spell Slot
